Looking for a quick and budget-friendly vegan dessert recipe to share this holiday? Try this delicious Lemon Carlota - and tell us what you think!  Recipe -  Lemon Carlota    🍋You will need:  3 packs of silken tofu (1kg) 3/4 cup lemon juice 3/4 cup sugar 3 teaspoons vanilla extract 2 and 1/2 packets of your favorite vegan cookies/wafers Directions: 🍋Add all the ingredients except the cookies to the blender, and process very well until you get a super creamy texture. In your mold or dessert pan, make a layer of cookies at the bottom. Add a layer of the tofu cream to cover the cookies. On top of the tofu add another layer of cookies and cover them with another layer of tofu. Continue like this until you finish with a layer of tofu on top. Let it sit in the refrigerator overnight. 🍋The next day decorate with a little lemon zest and leftover cookies. CARLOTA DE LIMON CON PROTEÍNA 🍋Necesitarás: 3 paquetes de tofu silken 3/4 taza de jugo de limón  3/4 taza de azúcar 3 cucharaditas de extracto de vainilla  2 y 1/2 paquetes de galletas tipo María (aptas) 🍋Agrega todos los ingredientes excepto las galletas a la licuadora y procesa muy bien hasta que obtengas una textura súper cremosa. En tu molde o refractario haz una capa de galletas al fondo. Agrega una capa de la crema de tofu para cubrir las galletas. Sobre el tofu agrega otra capa de galletas y cúbrelas con otra capa de tofu. Continúa así hasta terminar con una capa de tofu por encima. Deja que repose en el refrigerador toda la noche. 🍋Al día siguiente decora con un poco de ralladura de limón y moronitas de galleta. Looking for a quick and budget-friendly vegan dessert to make for Mother’s Day? Try this delicious Lemon Carlota - and tell us what you think!    Recipe Lemon Carlota 🍋 You will need:    3 packs of silken tofu (1kg)  3/4 cup lemon juice  3/4 cup sugar  3 teaspoons vanilla extract  2 and 1/2 packets of your favorite vegan cookies/wafer biscuits (check the comments for our recommendations)   Directions: 🍋Add all the ingredients except the cookies to the blender, and process very well until you get a super creamy texture.   In your mold or dessert pan, place a layer of cookies at the bottom. Add a layer of the tofu cream to cover the cookies.   On top of the tofu add another layer of cookies and cover them with another layer of tofu. Continue like this until you finish with a layer of tofu on top. Let it sit in the refrigerator overnight.   🍋The next day decorate with a little lemon zest and leftover cookies. Cut into squares and serve!  💕Save & share this recipe  🔊Let us know if you try this out!   #MothersDay #Recipe #Dessert #VeganDessert #PlantBased
